text: 4:12 1 Korin 16:11; Taitus 2:7; 2:15; 1 Pita 5:3Marazi nɨn gara ghaze, nɨ gumazir igiam. Egh gumazitam kamaghɨn nɨ mɨkɨman markiam, kar gumazir kɨnim. Eghtɨ nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim itiba bagh ababanimɨn uabɨ atɨgh. Egh arazir aghuibar amutɨ, me nɨn arazibar ganɨva, nɨn gɨn mangam. Nɨn arazir aghuibara kara: nɨn akar aghuiba, ko nɨn daroriba, ko nɨn arazir igharaz darazigh ifongezim, ko nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn arazim, ko Godɨn damazimɨn zuegha itir arazim.
